column4: augh this desktop is driving me insane.. I don't want to have to buy a whole new computer when I have all the parts for one in front of me
The screen shows "no signal" and turns off.
at the grub menu you dont see anything?
grub has a option to use a 'text' mode or lower res settings. that ive had to use on some machines.
but grub would still work.. you just couldent see it.
i got grub to play a little tune from its config file so im sure grub loaded. :)
